body.name: Criss Cross Office Chair with Wheels, Armless Computer Desk Chair, Cross Legged Chair, Modern Fabric Vanity Chair Height Adjustable Wide Seat Swivel Task Chair, Linen Beige
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 9 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Wide & Thick Seat】: The office chair has a very wide seat, you can comfortably sit cross-legged or curled up in the chair. U-shaped design gradually releases pressure on the back and hips from the middle to the sides, ensuring correct sitting posture and providing strong support for the back.

【Multi Function】: The desk chair is ergonomically designed with adjustable height, 360-degree swivel angle, and 100°-120° tilt angle, allowing for personalized comfort and support. It can be used not only as a vanity chair but also suitable for reading, watching TV, playing games, and other leisure activities.

【Sturdy Base & Smooth Wheels】: The cross legged office chair equipped with the sturdy and stable metal base with a capacity of up to 300 lbs. The base with smooth-rolling casters, enabling easy mobility and maneuverability around the office. You can also remove the wheels and replace them with pad feets depending on your preference.

【Fashion & Comfort】: An elegant blend of comfort and style, this armless office chair is the perfect seating solution for your workspace. The ergonomic design delivers a sleek look and provides plenty of durability and support for long-term use. Creating an impression of comfort and elegance, perfect for offices, bedrooms, studies, living rooms, dressers, parlors and dormitory.

【Simple Assembly】：This computer chair features a simple assembly design, allowing you to easily and quickly complete the installation process. With clear instructions and included tools, saving you time and effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cross Cross Apple Sauce Approved
reviews.reviewText: it’s so easy to put together. allen key and even spare bolts added. You also get wheels as well as flat feet. it’s wide and cozy but firm. it’s great. using in the bedroom as a vanity/ thinking chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this purchase. Pretty good quality chair. It’s very sturdy, has comfortable cushions, soft material, wheels move around smoothly. I’ll update my review if any issues come up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair Though It's a Little Hard
reviews.reviewText: The only flaw I can find with this chair is that the seat is very firm. I added a pillow to provide some cushion while working. The rest of this chair is great. It's wide enough for the cat to curl up with me. It was easy to build, and I love the denim-y blue. It's such a pretty color against my gray walls.The box did come badly damaged and had been taped up again by UPS, but nothing was missing or bent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this thing, seat is so wide my cat can sit next to me on it
reviews.reviewText: I got the light blue version without wheels. I'm using it by an antique sewing machine table that doubles as a computer desk. I wanted something without armrests as my spouse isn't careful when he spins the chair and leaves scratches from the armrests.I don't really sit criss cross that much, but, I like being able to sit sideways or bring a foot up and similarly fidget a bit while working at the computer. This is great for that. The fabric is sort of a coarse upholstery fabric, but it looks nice as pictured.Assembly was mostly easy, there was one challenging part. Pay careful attention that the plate you are screwing to the seat has the side labeled 'front' facing the section of the base labeled front. The difficult part is attaching the back of the chair to the seat of the chair. It seemed impossible to do. It looks like you can't push the cushions together close enough to line up the 4 screws. Instead, angle it a bit so you can just align the two top screws and start threading them in. As you tighten them a bit, that will get the two bottom screw holes aligned enough to get the screws in a couple turns. Then use the included tool to tighten the lower screws enough to bring the two parts together.Overall, it feels nice and sturdy. I'll update if it wears out early or something, but, in assembly nothing jumped out at me as being poorly made or anything. I feel like this is a good value at the $68 or so it was when I ordered it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trying out a "criss-cross" chair - so far, so good!
reviews.reviewText: Criss Cross Office Chair with Wheels, Armless Computer Desk Chair, Cross Legged Chair, Modern Fabric Vanity Chair Height Adjustable Wide Seat Swivel Task Chair, Linen BeigeMy observations (sorry, no video):Pro- Easy to assemble. It takes a few minutes, but after cutting open the box, the only tool needed--a hex wrench--is provided (it's a nice one, too). Male ego mandated that I assemble it on my own, but working with a partner would help.- Sturdy- ComfortableCon- Will I like the criss-cross style? I may have been spoiled by my previous chair having arm rests. We'll see!- I'm already worried about keeping this thing clean. Soft fabric, light colored, and the back is a blank slate for unwanted marks. Again--we'll see!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for crafting!
reviews.reviewText: FINALLY - a suitable upgrade for my wife's craft/studio space! Sitting cross-legged on standard chairs leads to sleeping limbs and a sore back - this chair fixes the issue. 4.3" range of adjustable height and seat tilt are very nice. The upholstery evens cleans up nicely in the event of a "happy little accident" appearing on the chair instead of the canvas... She has reported significantly improved comfort (cushion) over the cushioned folding chair that she had been using. Good price point and I keep seeing coupons to drop the cost even lower - solid choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy yet comfortable
reviews.reviewText: You guys ... I could take a nap in this thing it's so wide. I love it! And the color is awesome. It looks almost like a denim blue so goes well with the neutral coloring of my office.I love that the chair is armless and wheelless. I use an unusually shaped table for my office desk (think squarish kitchen table of sorts) so a lot of the chairs with arms won't work because of the height. This works great. And without the wheels, I don't have to worry about it sliding around unnecessarily on the wooden floor.It seems great quality. Thick in all the right places. Sturdy. But also comfortable to sit for long periods of time. And there's plenty of room for my writing muse (my cat) to jump up here beside me.The assembly was super simple and good instructions. With one caveat: when you're attaching the top of the chair to the seat cushion, you're going to have to angle it to get those screws in. At first glance, you may think, "this is not going to work," but I promise it does. And it's super great when you get the right angle.I love this chair. Very pleased. And it looks fantastic in the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble, Super Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The chair was easy to assemble and it came with everything needed to assemble. The most difficult part is putting the two pieces together because you need to push down and screw in. Definitely get someone to help you align for and easier time but it is definitely not necessary. Assembly is literally 4 steps, practically 3. It is comfortable. It is sturdy. Wish i could of gotten model with wheels.
